hotels.title: Tranquil Ohio City Retreat in the heart of Cleveland's University Circle
hotels.description: Nestled amidst the prestigious Cleveland Clinic campus, InterContinental Suites Hotel Cleveland, an IHG Hotel, provides an elevated, yet inviting, home-away-from-home in which to recuperate and relax. Immerse yourself in the vibrant city, with the charming Little Italy, iconic Rock and Roll Hall of Fame and the revered Cleveland Museum of Art all just moments away. Culinary excellence awaits your return, with the Italian-inspired C2 restaurant, bar and lounge serving a delectable array of dishes and sophisticated aperitifs.
